document.heading: District of Columbia Jail Improvement Amendment Act of 2003

history.narrative: Law 15-62, the “District of Columbia Jail Improvement Amendment Act of 2003”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-31, which was referred to Committee on the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 3, 2003, and July 8, 2003, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 29, 2003, it was assigned Act No. 15-112 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-62 became effective on January 30, 2004.
